metadata.title: CVE-2024-9341 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Go. When FIPS mode is enabled on a system, containerruntimes may incorrectly handle certain file paths due to impropervalidation in the containers/common Go library. This flaw allows anattacker to exploit symbolic links and trick the system into mountingsensitive host directories inside a container. This issue also allowsattackers to access critical host files, bypassing the intended isolationbetween containers and the host system.

criterions.comment: golang-github-containers-common package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
